response.original_title: Moment of Contact: New Revelations of Alien Encounters
response.overview: For the first time in history a neurosurgeon describes communication with a live captured alien. This expanded version of Moment of Contact: New Revelations of Alien Encounters sees James Fox return to Brazil in the wake of congressional hearings. Ground-breaking interviews with former police chief, pathologists, and Dr. Italo Venturelli who communicated with the alien.
response.title: Moment of Contact: New Revelations of Alien Encounters
